duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests with outstanding guest service during their stay.
Settle guest's account upon completion of their stay.
Provide attentive and courteous service to all guests prior to arrival and throughout their stay.
Handle check-ins and check-outs in a friendly and efficient manner.
Maintain cleanliness and safety throughout the hotel and grounds.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (College coursework in related field helpful)
